title: Cairo, Illinois. The public swimming pool has been changed to a "private pool" in order to remain segregated.
marks: \"#1\", in pencil, on back; \"Printer/Kelton/BLEAK BE \"Danny Lyon\", in pencil, on back
description: five black men waiting in line at left, while another black man faces four white men standing inside a doorway behind a sign reading, \"Private Pool/Members Only\"
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
